data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto, Ângelo Parise, Carvalho, Alcimar Do Lago (2010): A new species of Lauromacromia (Odonata: Corduliidae) from Southeastern Brazil, with a cladistic analysis of the genus and comments on Neotropical dragonfly biogeography. Zootaxa 2425: 45-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194576
